Articles.Content:
Hopefully I'm not repeating myself with this.

So KerboKatz seems to be dead since 1.4 and playing career without it is almost unbearable. What I need is directly and immediately buy science when I need it. Are there any mods that do the same/similar thing?

And I know about strategies. Tried them. Turns out they are worthless crap. Only lost funds setting up the Outsourced R&D one.

Edited July 10, 2019 by Wjolcz
